emails.subject: Looking to buy a 3BR townhome in Greenwood
emails.body_text: Hi Alex, a friend recommended you. We're looking for a 3 bedroom townhome around $700-750k, ideally in Greenwood or Phinney Ridge. We're hoping to move this summer.

emails.subject: Re: Looking to buy a 3BR townhome in Greenwood
emails.body_text: Hi Emma, thanks for reaching out! First step is confirming your pre-approval amount and timing. Are you already pre-approved, and what would be your ideal move-in date?

emails.subject: Re: Looking to buy a 3BR townhome in Greenwood
emails.body_text: Yes, we’re pre-approved up to $760k. Ideal move-in would be June or July.

emails.subject: First set of townhome options
emails.body_text: Great. I’ve pulled 6 townhomes in Greenwood and Phinney that fit your budget and timeline. Please review and let me know which 2–3 you’d like to tour first, ideally by Friday so I can schedule for the weekend.

emails.subject: Thinking about buying this year
emails.body_text: Hi Alex, I got your info from a coworker. I’m not sure if I’ll actually buy this year, but I’d like to understand what’s realistic around $500k in the city.

emails.subject: Re: Thinking about buying this year
emails.body_text: Hi Robert, happy to help you get oriented. At around $500k, condos are realistic, townhomes possible in a few pockets. Could we schedule a 20-minute call this week so I can walk you through some examples?

emails.subject: Re: Thinking about buying this year
emails.body_text: A quick call would be good. Evenings after 7pm are best. I don’t want to over-stretch myself so HOA fees and monthly payment are a big concern.

emails.subject: Interested in North Seattle 2BR condos
emails.body_text: Hi Alex, I'm looking for a 2 bedroom condo in North Seattle. Budget is around $550k. What would be the first step?

emails.subject: Re: Interested in North Seattle 2BR condos
emails.body_text: Thanks Maria! First step is getting pre-approved. I’ll send you my lender contacts and a short info form to complete. It’d be great if you could complete the form by Friday.

emails.subject: Quick follow-up on pre-approval
emails.body_text: Hi Maria, just checking in to see if you had a chance to connect with a lender and fill out the info form. Let me know if you have any questions.

emails.subject: Looking for a townhome under 700k
emails.body_text: Hi Alex, I'm looking for a 3BR townhome around $650-700k. Prefer south Seattle. What do you need from me to get started?

emails.subject: Re: Looking for a townhome under 700k
emails.body_text: Great to meet you Daniel! Could you send me your pre-approval letter by Friday? Also let me know your availability so we can set up a quick call to go over your criteria.

emails.subject: Quick follow-up
emails.body_text: Hi Daniel, just checking in — did you get a chance to send over the pre-approval or talk with a lender? Happy to introduce you to someone if needed.

emails.subject: Selling my Bellevue condo
emails.body_text: Hi Alex, I'm considering selling my 1BR condo in Bellevue. Could you help me understand the process and what I should prepare?

emails.subject: Re: Selling my Bellevue condo
emails.body_text: Absolutely, Sarah. First step is to review the HOA resale packet. Could you email me the HOA contact or request the resale packet and forward it to me once you receive it?

emails.subject: Re: Selling my Bellevue condo
emails.body_text: I just emailed the HOA to request the resale packet and copied you on the message. It should take them a couple of days.

emails.subject: Next step: staging photos
emails.body_text: Great, thanks Sarah. Next, we should schedule staging photography. Could you confirm whether your condo will be available for photos Monday or Tuesday next week?
